data.name: jobSoftwareDeveloper.strDetails
data.value:
As a software/systems developer you will:
• Adapt old systems and software to new standards
• Make sure programs adhere to common practices
• Test and debug software
• Fixing errors in old software
• Maintaining code
In addition, you will need the following skills:
• Using various IDEs
• Working in various languages
• Problem solving
• Code comprehension

data.name: jobSoftwareDeveloper.strEducation
data.value:
The recommended education for a software/systems developer is a bachelor's degree
In addition, you will need knowledge of:
• Multiple IDEs
• Common practices in many languages
• Security standards
•Version control systems (Git/Github)

data.name: jobProjectManager.strDetails
data.value:
As a project manager, you will:
• Manage budget
• Ensure efficiency in work
• Create plans
• Organize resources
• Handle communication
• Manage public relations
You will also need proficiency in the following:
• Communication
• Organization
• Time managment
• Leadership

data.name: jobProjectManager.strEducation
data.value:
The recommended education for a project manager is a bachelor's degree
In addition, you need to have knowledge in:
• Coordination
• Communication
• Communication software and services
• User managment software

data.name: jobDBAdmin.strDetails
data.value:
As a database administrator, you will:
• Work with large amounts of data
• Test and fix databases
• Ensure database organization
• Keep databases secure
In addition, you will also need to know how to:
• Write SQL queries
• Connect various services to your database
• Use data validation

data.name: jobDBAdmin.strEducation
data.value:
The recommended education for a Database administrator is a bachelors degree
You will also need knowledge on the following:
• Most recent database systems and frameworks
• How to write queries
• Organizational practices

data.name: jobProgrammer.strDetails
data.value:
As a computer programmer, you will do the following
• Maintain code
• Document code
• Test code
• Deploy software
You will also need these skills:
• Problem solving
• Mathematics

data.name: jobWebDeveloper.strDetails
data.value:
As a Web Developer, you will:
• Design responsive user interfaces in websites
• Manage databases for your backend
• Use networking knowledge to ensure server operation
• Use problem solving skills
You'll also need to be good at communicating to others.

data.name: jobSupportSpecialist.strDetails
data.value:
As a user support specialist, you will:
• Answer inquires
• Learn new systems fast
• Have a wide range of knowledge on multiple operating systems
• Give clear and consice directions
You will also need to be well versed in communication with others, and be able to give non-confusing directions in order to help your client

data.name: jobSecurityAnalyst.strDetails
data.value:
As a Information Security Analyst, you will:
• Ensure programs follow common security practices
• Use encryption to protect data
• Ensure validity of files and other data
• Find security vulnerabilities
• Create safe guards to stop attacks
You will also need these skills:
• Proficiency in using a CLI
• Communication with others
• Quick thinking

data.name: jobSecurityAnalyst.strEducation
data.value:
The recommended education for a information security analys is a bachelor's degree
In addition, you will need up-to-date knowledge on various security vulnerabilities and bugs. You also need to be familiar with various security interfaces and user managment systems.
